io.vertx.core.eventbus

Interface MessageCodec<S,R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanMessageCodec, BufferMessageCodec, ByteArrayMessageCodec, ByteMessageCodec, CharMessageCodec, DoubleMessageCodec, FloatMessageCodec, IntMessageCodec, JsonArrayMessageCodec, JsonObjectMessageCodec, LongMessageCodec, NullMessageCodec, PingMessageCodec, ReplyExceptionMessageCodec, ShortMessageCodec, StringMessageCodec

    public interface MessageCodec<S,R>
    Instances of this class must be stateless as they will be used concurrently.
    Author:
    Tim Fox
